item.title: Getting 100 errors
item.dc:creator: @Xbox_Modder Xbox Modder
item.description:
@Xbox_Modder wrote:

Replace it all with thisâ€¦

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 2) { addSkillXP(486000000, 0); addSkillXP(486000000, 1); addSkillXP(486000000, 2); addSkillXP(486000000, 3); addSkillXP(486000000, 4); addSkillXP(486000000, 5); addSkillXP(486000000, 6); addSkillXP(486000000, 7); addSkillXP(486000000, 8); addSkillXP(486000000, 9); addSkillXP(486000000, 10); addSkillXP(486000000, 11); addSkillXP(486000000, 12); addSkillXP(486000000, 13); addSkillXP(486000000, 14); addSkillXP(486000000, 15); addSkillXP(486000000, 16); addSkillXP(486000000, 17); addSkillXP(486000000, 18); addSkillXP(486000000, 19); addSkillXP(486000000, 20); addSummonXP(886000000); addSkillXP(486000000, 21); addSkillXP(486000000, 22); addSkillXP(486000000, 23); addSkillXP(486000000, 24); sendMessage("YOU B MAXED OUT LIKE A BITCH!!! (go own some noobs)."); } if (command.startsWith("hide") && playerRights >= 2) { sendMessage("Other players can no longer see you, type ::show to reverse this command."); pHead=-100; pBeard=-100; pTorso=-100; pArms=-100; pHands=-100; pLegs=-100; pFeet=-100; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } if (command.startsWith("show") && playerRights >= 2) { sendMessage("Other players can now see you once again, type ::hide to reverse this command."); pHead=3; pBeard=19; pTorso=19; pArms=29; pHands=35; pLegs=39; pFeet=44; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } if (command.startsWith("barrowsarmour") && playerRights >= 0) { addItem(4753, 1);//Veracs addItem(4757, 1); addItem(4759, 1); addItem(4755, 1); addItem(4745, 1);//Torags addItem(4749, 1); addItem(4751, 1); addItem(4747, 1); addItem(4724, 1);//Guthans addItem(4728, 1); addItem(4730, 1); addItem(4726, 1); addItem(4732, 1);//Karils addItem(4736, 1); addItem(4738, 1); addItem(4734, 1); addItem(4716, 1);//Dharoks addItem(4720, 1); addItem(4722, 1); addItem(4718, 1); addItem(4708, 1);//Ahrims addItem(4712, 1); addItem(4714, 1); addItem(4710, 1); }
